Literature.Title: Adepamycin: design, synthesis and biological properties of a new peptide with antimicrobial properties
Literature.Author: de Oliveira Almeida LH, de Oliveira CFR, de Souza Rodrigues M, Neto SM, de Araújo Boleti AP, Taveira GB, de Oliveira Mello É, Gomes VM, Dos Santos EL, Crusca Jr E, Franco OL, Cardoso MHES, Macedo MLR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=1.3-10.4 µM,Human erythrocytes:60% Hemolysis=335 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=0.9µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=1.4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.8µM),Klebsiella oxytoca(MIC=3.6µM),Salmonella enterica(MIC=>10µM),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=>10µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>10µM),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>10µM),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>10µM),Serratia marcescens(MIC=>10µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1.8µM),Staphylococcus saprophyticus(MIC=>10µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus(MIC=>10µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>10µM),Candida albicans CE022(IC50=5.2µM),Candida tropicalis CE017(IC50=41.6µM)
